summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Improvement of Ashworth Ave. N. from N. 135th St. to N. 137th St.; and from N. 140th St. to N. 145th St.; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, Local Improvement District No. 6711 and appropriating money from the Water Fund in Aid thereof as a loan.
